title: Cross-Cultural Competency Development Project Based on Remote Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and practical experience in primary education settings
context.additional_context: Strengthening Practical Competencies for Multicultural Educational Environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three strategies for recognizing and adapting to cultural differences in virtual team activities
Learners can contribute to the completion of educational projects by utilizing international online collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Slack)
Learners can develop content proposals that consider cultural contexts when designing multicultural education scenarios
Learners can submit at least two improvement plans for virtual teamwork based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
